summary: Completed testing of manual trade bug fixes. Both reported bugs are now fixed: 1) Trade detail popup shows all fields correctly (Days in Trade, Contracts, Option Strike, Option Expiry, IBKR Fees), 2) Dashboard bar chart shows unrealized P/L for open manual trades. Fixed minor frontend issue where Days in Trade showed '-' for value 0.
seed_data_creation: Created test user test_manual_trade@example.com with password testpassword123
context_for_next_testing_agent: Manual trade bug fixes verified. Backend properly stores and normalizes field names (option_strike, option_expiry, contracts, days_in_trade, total_fees, account). Frontend Portfolio.js was updated to use nullish coalescing (??) instead of OR (||) for days_in_trade to properly display 0 values. Dashboard bar chart shows Open Positions - Unrealized P/L when there are open trades.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Trade detail popup not showing Days in Trade, Contracts, Option Strike, Option Expiry, IBKR Fees for manual trades
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: All fields now display correctly in popup. Backend stores correct field names and normalizes old data.

bugs_verified_fixed.bug: Dashboard bar chart not populating for manual trades
bugs_verified_fixed.verification: Open Positions - Unrealized P/L bar chart shows manual trades with correct P/L values.

minor_fix_applied.change: Changed 'selectedTrade.days_in_trade || '-'' to 'selectedTrade.days_in_trade ?? '-'' to properly display 0 values
